DEMO_016_MSG_010:
́How could this be!? Is this as far as I, Jack, will get!?
I must woefully submit... You have me! It is I... Jack!
DEMO_016_MSG_020:
́My god, Jack! Calm down, it's just me!
I've managed to escape that horrible fortress!
DEMO_016_MSG_100:
́My word... Are you sure you're up to such a 
difficult task, my boy!?
DEMO_016_MSG_030: ́Well now... if it isn't my good friend! I am so relieved to see that you've returned safely, Nochorin!
DEMO_016_MSG_110: ́Then I... No... All of us, are in your debt! I'm moved to tears by your kindness, stranger! It is unheard of these days!
DEMO_016_MSG_040:
́I expected nothing less, my swift friend. Naturally, you managed to escape from that dreadful castle!
ā
DEMO_016_MSG_120:
́First, I ask that you go speak with Ace. He'll have a better idea of how to tackle this situation.
ā
DEMO_016_MSG_050:
́But what has become of His Majesty and the other
villagers, Nochorin?
DEMO_016_MSG_130: ́He's been devising a plan of his own, after all. Once you've spoken with him, stop back and see me and Nochorin.
DEMO_016_MSG_060:
́I had to leave them all there... There was no other way!
I needed to go find help in order to rescue them.
DEMO_016_MSG_070:
́Dreadful, dreadful news! Our poor King! 
Cursed by his inability to move about on his own!
DEMO_016_MSG_080:
́Fear not, Jack! I have an ace up my sleeve this time!
I've got us a secret weapon!
DEMO_016_MSG_090: ́ȁ here... he is a Monster Master! Surely, with him on our side, we'll be able to rescue all of the Nochoro!
